desc: Carp fishing pop ups and liquid goo bait additives angling boilies

layout.text: At carpalytic we offer the best possible baits and liquids for the very best prices. Not only do we use some off the finest quality ingredients but we use the very best blending and mixing equipment out there. our base mixes is a unique combination of proteins ,minerals ,vitamins and much more . This is carefully blended together to give the perfect bait suited for every angling situation. The uses are only limited by your imagination .
